description:
Given an m x n matrix `board` containing 'X' and 'O', capture all regions that are 4-directionally surrounded by 'X'.

A region is captured by flipping all 'O's into 'X's in that surrounded region. An 'O' is not captured if it is on the border or is connected (4-directionally) to an 'O' on the border.

The function modifies the board in-place and returns void.

See the full problem on [LeetCode 130](https://leetcode.com/problems/surrounded-regions/).

examples.explanation: The 'O' at (3,1) is connected to the border so it stays. The other 'O's are surrounded and become 'X'.
